txt_en: Don't let the mistakes and disappointments of the past control and direct your future.
txt_cn: 不要让未来的你被过去的错误与失望所掌控。
author: Zig Ziglar

txt_en: Don't be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams.
txt_cn: 别为困难所迫，要以梦想为引。
author: 爱默生

txt_en: This universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
txt_cn: 宇宙并不在你之外。看看自己的内心吧。你想要的一切，都已尽在你身。
author: Rumi

txt_en: This universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
txt_cn: 宇宙并不在你之外。看看自己的内心吧。你想要的一切，都已尽在你身。
author: Rumi

txt_en: A winner never stops trying.
txt_cn: 胜者永不停止尝试。
author: Tom Landry

txt_en: The most difficult thing is the decision to act; the rest is merely tenacity.
txt_cn: 最困难的是下定决心去做，剩下的只是坚持而已。
author: Amelia Earhart

txt_en: Life is not only merriment. It is desire and determination.
txt_cn: 生活并不只有欢声笑语，还得要有抱负和决心。
author: 纪伯伦

txt_en: What you seek is seeking you.
txt_cn: 你正在寻找的东西也在找寻你。
author: Rumi

txt_en: It is the power of thought that gives man power over nature.
txt_cn: 人类之所以能够驾驭自然，是因为思想的力量。
author: 安徒生

txt_en: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare; it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.
txt_cn: 并不是因为事情难我们才不敢去做，而是因为我们不敢做事情才难。
author: Seneca

txt_en: There is nothing so useless as doing efficiently that which should not be done at all.
txt_cn: 最没用的，莫过于有效地做那些根本没必要做的事。
author: Peter Drucker

txt_en: Don't allow your rituals to become ruts.
txt_cn: 切忌墨守成规。
author: Todd Henry

txt_en: If you can imagine it, you can achieve it. If you can dream it, you can become it.
txt_cn: 凡是能想象到的，就能被实现，能够成为梦想的，就能够成真。
author: William Arthur Ward

txt_en: Turn the page, maybe we'll find a brand new ending.
txt_cn: 翻过陈旧的昨天，或许会迎来完全不一样的结局。
author: Adam Levine, "Lost Stars"

txt_en: It's your life; you don't need someone's permission to live the life you want.
txt_cn: 生活是你自己的，想过什么样的生活，不需要别人的许可。
author: Roy T. Bennett

txt_en: Those are my principles, and if you don't like them… well, I have others.
txt_cn: 那是我的原则，要是你不喜欢……那我还有其他原则。
author: Groucho Marx

txt_en: Life is about making an impact, not making an income.
txt_cn: 生命在于影响他人，而非赚钱糊口。
author: Kevin Kruse

txt_en: Humanity is won by continuing to play in face of certain defeat.
txt_cn: 就算可能失败，也要继续前行，可谓是真正的人。
author: Ralph Ellison

txt_en: When someone loves you, the way they talk about you is different. You feel safe and comfortable.
txt_cn: 爱你的人谈起你的方式是不一样的，你会觉得安全又舒服。
author: Jess C. Scott

txt_en: Every day women and men become legends.
txt_cn: 每天都有人书写不朽的传奇诗篇。
author: Common, "Glory"

txt_en: A lantern can give you light only when you light it.
txt_cn: 灯笼若要闪亮，需要你去点亮。
author: Munia Khan

txt_en: It's not what you say out of your mouth that determines your life; it's what you whisper to yourself that has the most power!
txt_cn: 你嘴上说什么决定不了你的生活，起决定作用的是你在心里告诉自己什么！
author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

txt_en: Unable to perceive the shape of you, I find you all around me. Your presence fills my eyes with your love.
txt_cn: 无法感知你的形状，但我能感到你就在我的四周。在我眼里，你的存在就是爱。
author: 《水形物语》

txt_en: Go after what you really love and find a way to make that work for you, and then you'll be a happy person.
txt_cn: 追求你真正热爱的，并能充分利用，你就是幸福的。
author: Tom Petty

txt_en: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try.
txt_cn: 失败可能会让你失望，但若不去尝试，就必定会失败。
author: Beverly Sills

txt_en: Who can say where the road goes? Where the day flows? Only time.
txt_cn: 谁能说得清道路向何方漫延，岁月向何方流逝？唯有时光。
author: Enya, "Only Time"

txt_en: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
txt_cn: 情是君喜胜于己欢。
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

txt_en: You cannot let your father's actions define your life. You get to decide what kind of king you want to be.
txt_cn: 你的生活不是追随父亲的脚步，而是要做自己的国王。
author: 《黑豹》

txt_en: Our lives are defined by opportunities, even the ones we miss.
txt_cn: 我们的生命取决于机遇，包括那些错过的机遇。
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
